CorePluginsAdmin.InfoPluginUpdateIsRecommended: Update your plugins now to benefit from the latest improvements.

CorePluginsAdmin.PluginsExtendPiwik: Plugins extend and expand the functionality of Piwik.

CorePluginsAdmin.ThemesDescription: Themes can change the appearance of Piwik user interface, and provide a completely new visual experience to enjoy your analytics reports.
CorePluginsAdmin.UninstallConfirm: You are about to uninstall a plugin %s. The plugin will be completely removed from your platform and it won't be recoverable. Are you sure you want to do this?
